name: Doctor
hint: A person trained to treat and cure illnesses

name: President
hint: The person who runs the country

name: Neurosurgeon
hint: A specialist surgeon who operates on the brain and nervous system

name: Elephant
hint: A large mammal with tusks and a trunk

name: Pangolin
hint: An anteater-like mammal covered in scales, native to Africa and Asia

name: Istanbul
hint: A major city in Turkey that straddles Europe and Asia
